title: Structural and morphological investigation of (R)-α-phenylethylammonium-oxalate in bulk vs. nanowires on a modified substrate surface
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8434-8444
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00558A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sanja Burazer, Tereza Košutová, Lukáš Horák, Milan Dopita, Ana Šantić, Anna Fučíková
Different forms of a chiral organic insulator, (R)-α-phenylethylammonium-oxalate (RAPEAO), was prepared: single crystal, powder and spin-coated layers on silicon substrate surfaces modified by plasma treatment or a polymer layer.
